concept.title: Use UCS Presets
concept.shortdesc: On the Orthographic UCS tab of the UCS dialog box, the systemlists several preset coordinate systems, from which you can choose the desired one.

conbody.p: After specifying a UCS, you can control whether choosing a preset option shifts the UCS relative to the current UCS orientation or relative to the default WCS. If you use the Restore, World, or Previous option of the UCS command, the settings you made are not available.
